name: atlassian-iam
label: Atlassian IAM
description: Integrate with Atlassian's services to execute CRUD operations for employee lifecycle processes.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: URL of the Atlassian server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Access Token
fields.name: access_token
fields.description: Access Token configured for your account to access the Atlassian server and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Directory ID
fields.name: directoryId
fields.description: Directory ID configured for your account to access the Atlassian server and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Create User
operations.description: Create a user in a directory based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Username
parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: Username of the user which you want to create in Atlassian.

parameters.title: Email Address
parameters.name: emails
parameters.description: Email address of the user which you want to create in Atlassian.

parameters.title: Title
parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Title of the user which you want to create in Atlassian.

parameters.title: Department
parameters.name: department
parameters.description: Department of the user which you want to create in Atlassian.

parameters.title: Organization
parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Organization of the user which you want to create in Atlassian.

parameters.title: Active
parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Organization of the user which you want to create in Atlassian.

parameters.title: Custom Filter
parameters.name: custom_filter
parameters.tooltip: The query filter to create user. e.g. {"displayName": "test", "nickName",: "nickname", "preferredLanguage",: "language"}
parameters.description: Query filter using which you want to create user in Atlassian. For example, {"displayName": "test", "nickName",: "nickname", "preferredLanguage",: "language"}

operations.title: Get Users
operations.description: Get users from the directory based on the input parameters you have specified.

operations.title: Update User
operations.description: Create a user in a directory based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: User ID
parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User ID of the user which you want to update in Atlassian.

parameters.title: Username
parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: Username of the user which you want to update in Atlassian.

parameters.title: Email Address
parameters.name: emails
parameters.description: Email address of the user which you want to create in Atlassian.

parameters.title: Title
parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Title of the user which you want to create in Atlassian.

parameters.title: Department
parameters.name: department
parameters.description: Department of the user which you want to create in Atlassian.

parameters.title: Organization
parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Organization of the user which you want to create in Atlassian.

parameters.title: Custom Filter
parameters.name: custom_filter
parameters.tooltip: The query filter to update user. e.g. {"displayName": "test", "nickName",: "nickname", "preferredLanguage",: "language"}
parameters.description: Query filter using which you want to update user information in Atlassian. For example, {"displayName": "test", "nickName",: "nickname", "preferredLanguage",: "language"}

operations.title: Deactivate User
operations.description: Deactivate a user by userId in Atlassian.

parameters.title: User ID
parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User ID of the user which you want to deactivate in Atlassian.
